The postings don't include faces or names but still seem questionable. Doesn't this violate patient privacy?-- Name Withheld, New

Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.

And here we're so concerned about the treatment of those individuals.[ 37] Defense Donald Rumsfeld stated, "What has been charged so far is abuse, which I believe technically is different from torture. I'm not going to address the "torture" word.

Andy Coulson has been under strain over allegations of widespread hacking of mobile phone messages by journalists at the News of the World when he was editor of the paper, from which he resigned in 2007. I can today confirm that I've resigned as Downing Street director of communications, Andy Coulson said in a statement. Nine men reportedly repelled into the building through the roof.
